name: SonaSound - UNIX Sonogram
short_description: Sonogram and waveform display programm for Unix using different algorithms like FFT and  LPC to display musical features or potential artefacts that you may no be able to hear.  Superimposed tuneable Staff-Lines allow for easy transcription of music.
